revisions.rev:
'''Zasu''' may refer to:
*Zasu, Master of the seat, head of the temple (abbot) in [[SÅkan]], the Japanese system of rankings for Buddhist clergy *Zasu (horse) **1974 winner of the [[Champagne Stakes (Australia)]], a Group 1 horse race in Australia for two-year-old thoroughbreds **1975 winner of the [[Queensland Oaks]], a Group 1 Australian thoroughbred horse race for 3 year old fillies at set weights *[[List of Square Enix games#MSX|Zasu]], game developed by defunct company Enix *[[Zasu Knight]], actress in [[Buffy the Vampire Slayer adult parodies#Buffy the Vampire Layer|Buffy the Vampire Slayer adult parodies]] *[[ZaSu Pitts Memorial Orchestra]], formed in San Francisco by Stephen Ashman, recorded several LPs from 1984-1987 and continue to be active *Zasu River or [[Yazoo River]], a river in the U.S. state of Mississippi
==People== *[[ZaSu Pitts]] (1894-1963), American movie actress
==See also== *[[List of The Lion King characters#The Lion King 1Â½|Zazu]], a fictional hornbill who first appeared in the Walt Disney Pictures animated film The Lion King, incorrectly listed as 'Zasu'
